fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Taxation, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: We follow EU policies in the context of our professional activities. We are interested in learning how policymaking will impact economic conditions in the economies we are active in (developed and emerging markets).
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Stone Milliner Asset Management ("Stone Milliner") is a global alternative asset management company with offices in the UK and Switzerland. Established in January 2012, Stone Milliner manages a discretionary global macro strategy, investing across all asset classes with a focus on foreign exchange and fixed income, in both emerging and developed markets.
